description: [``botocore``] This release adds the description field on ListAnomaliesForInsight and DescribeAnomaly API responses for proactive anomalies.
[``botocore``] New fields were added to reflect availability zone data in source server and recovery instance description commands responses, as well as source server launch status.

[``botocore``] CloudWatch Internet Monitor is a a new service within CloudWatch that will help application developers and network engineers continuously monitor internet performance metrics such as availability and performance between their AWS-hosted applications and end-users of these applications

[``botocore``] This release adds the ability to create ESMs with Document DB change streams as event source. For more information see  https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/with-documentdb.html.
[``botocore``] The AWS Elemental MediaConvert SDK has added support for HDR10 to SDR tone mapping, and animated GIF video input sources.
[``botocore``] This release adds the ability to ingest batched historical data or migrate data in bulk from S3 into Timestream using CSV files.
